alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 4:14PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Horry County through 445 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hand, or near North Myrtle Beach Airport, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Wampee, Hammond, Hand, Nixonville, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, Briarcliffe Acres and Grand Strand Regional Medical Center. This includes the following highways... SC Highway 31 between mile markers 8 and 19. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 17 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
